title: Make It Yourself
description: A web application that enables you to make your own domain expert chatbot.

title: Algerian License Plate Recegnition System
description: A system for detecting cars and license plates, extracting plate text with OCR, and storing images, text, and timestamps in a folder.

title: Algerian eCommerce Backend (Microservices)
description: Containerized microservices (user, product, cart, order, payment) with Chargily (CIB/Edahabia) and Cash on Delivery support. Uses Traefik, Redis, and RabbitMQ.

title: Real-Time Collaboration Platform
description: A web application that enable users to collaborate and share documents in real time.

title: TTK ePay Python Client
description: Python SDK for TTK ePay payment gateway. Handles secure API communication (request signing) and supports payment operations (initiation, verification, status checks).
